ROIs in the net spectrum¶

Similarly to what was done in the original spectrum, we now delimit the regions in the liquid spectrum. At this step, new peaks may be discovered that were previously hidden by the continuum, and previously detected peaks may be discarded as artifacts arising from statistical noise.

From here, the peaks and regions can be analyzed directly to obtain their parameters and define fitting functions for them.

OGRaySpY
